label: File and Folder Attributes
description: Get File and Folder details for advanced filesystem manipulation
FilesinFolder.label: Files in Folder
FilesinFolder.description: Returns an ordered list of all files (including hidden files) in a directory by customizable sort order
FilesinFolder.inputFolder.label: Folder Path to Evaluate
FilesinFolder.sortType.label: File sorting method
FileAttributes.label: File Attributes
FileAttributes.description: Returns a Dictionary of file attributes for the provided file path
FileAttributes.inputFile.label: Path of file to evaluate
FolderAttributes.label: Folder Attributes
FolderAttributes.description: Returns attributes for the provided Folder path
FolderAttributes.inputFolder.label: Path of Folder to Evaluate
AllFileInSubDirs.label: Files in Folder Deep
AllFileInSubDirs.node_label: All files in directory and subdirectories of {{inputFolder}}
AllFileInSubDirs.description: Returns all files in directory and subdirectories of provided folder
AllFileInSubDirs.return_label: List of Files in Directory and Subdirectories
AllFileInSubDirs.inputFolder.label: Path of Folder to Evaluate
FoldersinFolder.label: Folders in Folder
FoldersinFolder.description: Returns a list of direct subfolders of the provided parent folder
FoldersinFolder.return_label: List of direct Subfolders in Folder
FoldersinFolder.inputFolder.label: Folder Path to Evaluate
